item.title: Gap and Disney’s New ‘Nightmare Before Christmas’ Collection Puts a Jack Skellington Twist On Spooky Season Style
item.description: A 23-piece collection features clothing, sleepwear and accessories inspired by Tim Burton’s hit stop-motion animated film.
